name: super kaiju dunk city
description:
We made a game!

Shortcuts:

  • Level 1
  • Level 2
  • Level 3
Controls:

During game play, when an icon meets the Kaiju's ball-hand, press LEFT / DOWN / UP / RIGHT / X (or the left "face" button on a game pad) to slam it.

Slamming early or late will cause you great suffering.
